title: Cashier PT
info: my first ever real job, which i really value because not only did it strengthen my communication skills, but it also taught me to handle challenging situations while adapting to a new environment.

title: Full-Stack Developer Intern
info: i spent 2 months of Summer 2024 with 7 other students building a website that resulted in me being proficient in tools like React.js, Node.js, SCSS and also gained knowledge of how Express.js worked with our backend - MongoDB.

title: Teaching Assistant
info: following my successful Summer 2024 internship, i landed a Teaching Assistant role at my university, where i co-lead labs in a variety of courses to guide and assist students through their labs, and assignments, or any questions or concerns that they had.
